fields.Title: INVENTORY / GIANT HAM SANDWICH
START
input
You: ""Friends forever!" (Eat your half o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Friends forever!" (Eat your half of the sandwich.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll pass," the lieutenant replies..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll pass," the lieutenant replies with a polite nod. "Thanks."

fields.Title: Gaston's Sandwich: "You really ram into the sandwich, *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You really ram into the sandwich, *deep*. The tomato slides off, mayo drips everywhere (including your moustache and clothes), bits of ham fall onto the ground...

fields.Title: You: ""Congratulations, Kim. It was a tes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Congratulations, Kim. It was a test and you passed."

fields.Title: You: ""What do you mean 'you'll pass'?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you mean 'you'll pass'?"

fields.Title: You: "Proceed with the mission."
fields.Dialogue Text: Proceed with the mission.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes! By sharing this sandwich you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes! By sharing this sandwich you and I solidify the bond between us."

fields.Title: You: ""I just thought it would be a nice..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just thought it would be a nice gesture. I'm sorry..."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "This man does not crack under press..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This man does not crack under pressure. Stars would die before he'd succumb to any kind of manipulation. With this realization comes a sudden flash of pride.

You: ""This is good shit." (Eat your half..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is good shit." (Eat your half of the sandwich.)

fields.Title: You: ""Look what you did...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look what you did..."

fields.Title: You: ""Great, that's 2000 kilo-calories w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great, that's 2000 kilo-calories wasted right there."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He shrugs. "I mean I'm not hungry a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He shrugs. "I mean I'm not hungry and therefore am not gonna take it. Thanks though."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm just not hungry and therefore have little reason to take it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stop that!" He doesn't sound amuse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stop that!" He doesn't sound amused.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, it's... it's okay. Let's share..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it's... it's okay. Let's share it, okay?" The lieutenant breaks the sandwich in two and quickly eats his half.

fields.Title: Gaston's Sandwich: "The taste-assault in your mouth aba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The taste-assault in your mouth abates for a moment... wolfing it down is efficient, but lacking in appreciation.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Camaraderie?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Camaraderie?"

fields.Title: You: "Get into there and do some real dam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Get into there and do some real damage!

fields.Title: You: "Do not lower the sandwich."
fields.Dialogue Text: Do not lower the sandwich.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay-okay. They are all necessary...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay-okay. They are all necessary. Let's share the sandwich, if it matters that much to you." The lieutenant breaks the sandwich in two and quickly eats his half.

fields.Title: You: ""Here, Kim! Let's share." (Hold out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Here, Kim! Let's share." (Hold out the sandwich.)

fields.Title: You: "Hold the sandwich up for the lieute..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hold the sandwich up for the lieutenant to take it.

fields.Title: You: ""Is this necessary?! Is friendship..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is this necessary?! Is friendship necessary? Is brotherhood?"

fields.Title: Gaston's Sandwich: "You can barely feel the taste, but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can barely feel the taste, but it seems decent enough. At least it gets your stomach nice and full. Good sandwich -- durable!

fields.Title: You: "Send the HAM fighter-craft for anot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Send the HAM fighter-craft for another mission.

fields.Title: Gaston's Sandwich: "The sandwich falls to the ground wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sandwich falls to the ground with a splat, tomatoes and lettuce flying everywhere, mayo spilling out like blood on a crime scene.

Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's eyes express an ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's eyes express an absolute lack of interest.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer. We have serious matters t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer. We have serious matters to attend to. I suggest we get to them right now." He seems completely unfazed by the situation.

Gaston's Sandwich: "The bread, as the foundation of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bread, as the foundation of the sandwich, is slightly moist due to tomato juice and mayo, but holds together nicely. Almost nothing falls off the sandwich. You feel like you really got everything out of this experience.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant slaps the sandwich o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant slaps the sandwich out of your hand faster than you could ever hope to react in your sorry state. It lands in the dirt and falls apart.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, but *why* don't you want it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, but *why* don't you want it?"

fields.Title: You: ""Not you, though?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not you, though?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Sandwich Hub]
You: ""It *really* is.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It *really* is."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: You: "Lower the sandwich."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lower the sandwich.

fields.Title: Gaston's Sandwich: "It really is every bit as good as i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It really is every bit as good as it looked and smelled. The different components all chip in and compliment each other, forming a flavour that is unique to this particular masterpiece.

fields.Title: sandwicheswithkim
Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant stands next to you,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant stands next to you, but he might as well exist in a parallel realm.

fields.Title: Composure: "A bad idea. Men like the lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A bad idea. Men like the lieutenant are not won over by such childish manoeuvres.

fields.Title: You: ""I cannot be bought!" (Throw the sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I cannot be bought!" (Throw the sandwich on the ground.)
fields.Alternate1: "Fuck comeraderie, fuck friendship, FUCK THIS SANDWICH!" (Slam it in the ground.)

fields.Title: Authority: "The bonds between officers -- partn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The bonds between officers -- partners -- are *paramount*. That's how trust is built. Trust saves lives.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods and adds, "But..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods and adds, "But you go right ahead."

fields.Title: You: "Take giant bites and swallow them h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Take giant bites and swallow them half-chewed.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, I guess I'll keep it for lat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, I guess I'll keep it for later."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then sure. Let us 'strengthen our..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then sure. Let us 'strengthen our bond'." The lieutenant breaks the sandwich in two and quickly eats his half.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Is it really necessary?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is it really necessary?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "It's a little joke the lieutenant m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a little joke the lieutenant made. He knows what you meant.

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: "Lower the sandwich."]
You: ""Step back everyone, it's gonna get..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Step back everyone, it's gonna get messy." (Eat the sandwich.)

fields.Title: You: "Have the sandwich-interceptor circl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Have the sandwich-interceptor circle in front of the lieutenant's face and then gently nosedive against his lips.

fields.Title: You: "Eat your half in silence."
fields.Dialogue Text: Eat your half in silence.

fields.Title: You: "Move the sandwich around in front o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Move the sandwich around in front of the lieutenant's mouth and make aircraft noises.

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, okay then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, okay then."

fields.Title: You: ""No, you're right. Let's just drop..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, you're right. Let's just drop it."

fields.Title: The Sandwich Hub
You: "Hold the sandwich up, moving it clo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hold the sandwich up, moving it closer to the his chin.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No."

fields.Title: Gaston's Sandwich: "The sandwich falls to the floor wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sandwich falls to the floor with a loud splat, tomatoes and lettuce flying everywhere, mayo spilling out like blood on a crime scene.

fields.Title: You: "Slow down, feel the texture of the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Slow down, feel the texture of the components and subtle nuances in taste.

fields.Title: Gaston's Sandwich: "The ham-sandwich looks fresh and nu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The ham-sandwich looks fresh and nutritious in you hand, begging to be eaten.

fields.Title: You: ""For the brötherhööd!" (Eat your ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For the brötherhööd!" (Eat your half of the sandwich.)

fields.Title: Half Light: "So worth it -- can you feel how lib..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So worth it -- can you feel how liberating that was? De-compression completed.

fields.Title: Empathy: "A treat of this magnitude should no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A treat of this magnitude should not be enjoyed alone.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Ouch... he did *not* like that."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ouch... he did *not* like that.

fields.Title: Untitled hub (02)
Gaston's Sandwich: "The wrapper -- soaked in tomato jui..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The wrapper -- soaked in tomato juice and mayo -- is not gonna hold out forever, but for now the sandwich retains it's impressive composure.

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Sandwich Hub]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." The lieutenant nods. "Very..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." The lieutenant nods. "Very nourishing. Let's go solve crimes now."

fields.Title: Gaston's Sandwich: "You jam your teeth into the sandwic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You jam your teeth into the sandwich and immediately feel a series of taste explosions go off in you mouth. It's like someone's carpet-bombing your tongue with ambrosia.

fields.Title: Gaston's Sandwich: "This is what angels must taste like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is what angels must taste like. Your saliva production increases tenfold. You can barely contain it all.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Thank you, but no, I'm not hungry.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you, but no, I'm not hungry."

fields.Title: You: ""Hey!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "One look at the lieutenant immediat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One look at the lieutenant immediately tells you he is ready for your Assault-Sandwich.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great." The lieutenant shakes his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great." The lieutenant shakes his head. "Wonderful. Good job. I mean why *wouldn't* you throw it... wait, turns out I don't actually care. Leave it and let's go."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "You mean semen, right?"
fields.Dialogue Text: You mean semen, right?

fields.Title: You: ""This isn't about hunger, Kim, it's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This isn't about hunger, Kim, it's about camaraderie."

fields.Title: You: ""You know, Kim, if I were to hold t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, Kim, if I were to hold this sandwich up long enough..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure, sure." The lieutenant nods i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure, sure." The lieutenant nods impatiently. "Time to go solve a murder investigation."

fields.Title: You: "[Put the sandwich away.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Put the sandwich away.]

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Sandwich Hub]
Jump to: [The Sandwich Hub]

fields.Dialogue Text: "Go through all that and then just dump it?" The lieutenant smirks. "You better just eat it, no need for dramatic gestures."

fields.Dialogue Text: "No."

fields.Dialogue Text: When you hold something up long enough, some people are compelled to take it. Try it on the lieutenant.

fields.Title: You: "Keep holding the sandwich."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep holding the sandwich.

fields.Dialogue Text: "...some people would feel compelled to take it. Yes, I know."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm just not hungry.""
